org.openstreetmap.gui.jmapviewer
Class MapLine2

java.lang.Object
  org.openstreetmap.gui.jmapviewer.MapLine2
All Implemented Interfaces:
MapLine
public class MapLine2
extends Object
implements MapLine

A simple implementation of the MapLine interface. Each map marker is painted as a circle with a black border line and filled with a specified color. See MapLine for usage information

Author:
Johan
